2550/A0/08/801/003.indicator_name: % of births attended by skilled attendants
2550/A0/08/801/003.headline: Enhanced capacity to provide maternal  newborn and child health services increased skilled birth attendance from 47.6 per cent to 56.8 per cent between 2015 and 2016. The proportion of pregnant women using IPT2 also increased from 37.2 per cent to 48.4 per cent in the same period.

Enhanced capacity to provide maternal  newborn and child health services increased skilled birth attendance from 47.6 per cent to 56.8 per cent between 2015 and 2016. The proportion of pregnant women using IPT2 also increased from 37.2 per cent to 48.4 per cent in the same period.
